alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 14 at 11:52AM EDT until March 17 at 2:51AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Mount Carmel. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Vincennes. Wabash River at Riverton. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southwestern Indiana. Flooding is expected to continue on the Wabash into Thursday. River levels are falling. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton.along both rivers * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, High water surrounds elevated river cabins. County roads to these cabins are impassable. Agricultural flooding is in progress. Seep water develops behind levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday /11:00 AM EDT Tuesday/ the stage was 19.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday /11:00 AM EDT Tuesday/ was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue falling to along both rivers6.6 feet Friday, March 24.along both rivers - Flood stage is 15.0 feet.along both rivers - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
